Our mission is simple: to create a space where women feel seen, valued, and confident. We believe beauty starts from the foundation;… a healthy scalp, a good hair routine, and self-care that shines through.

Caroline’s passion for hair goes beyond styling. With years of experience working with different textures and transformations, she’s built HABC as a place where women can relax, learn about their hair, and walk out looking and feeling renewed.

cta_description:
Please take a moment to review our salon policies before booking your appointment. These guidelines ensure we provide the best experience for every client.

• Pricing
All listed prices are starting prices. Additional charges may apply depending on your hair’s condition, length, and density.

• Hair Preparation
Please ensure your hair is fully detangled before your appointment, unless you’ve booked a detangling service.
Detangling takes additional time and, if not scheduled in advance, may affect the rest of our day’s appointments
 • Hair Extensions
We do not sell hair extensions in the salon. Please bring your own hair for installation.
If you need guidance on what type or brand to purchase, feel free to call us for recommendations.

 • Business Hours & After-Hours Appointments
Our working hours are Monday–Saturday, 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM.
Appointments requested outside of these hours will incur an additional $20 per hour fee.

 •Guests
Due to limited space, we kindly ask that clients DO YOU bring extra guests or children to their appointments.

 • Scheduling
Please schedule your appointment at a time when you are not rushed or on a tight schedule.
Our stylists perform best when they can focus and work without pressure.

 • Sisterlocs Services
		Sisterlocs reties start at $200 and include a shampoo if done within six weeks.
		New Sisterlocs clients must provide proof of their last retie or installation date.
		A $20 fee will be added for each additional week beyond the six-week window.
		If you were previously an HABC Sisterlocs client but later switched to another loctician, we cannot take you back as a client, unless your hair was maintained outside the country (for example, during travel to Africa).

 •Cancellations & Lateness
		Cancellations made at least 24 hours in advance are eligible for a full refund.
		Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the appointment will be charged a 50% cancellation  fee.
		Appointments will automatically cancel if a client is more than 15 minutes late.
		In such cases, no refund will be issued if a deposit was made.
		The service may still proceed if a late fee (30% of the service total) is paid.

 Punctuality and preparation allow us to serve you and other clients efficiently.

about_para1:
Welcome to HABC and Beauty, a professional salon suite founded and run by Caroline, located in the heart of Frisco, Texas.

At HABC, we specialize in healthy hair care for Black women, focusing on styles that protect, restore, and enhance natural beauty, from chemical services, custom wig installs and sew-ins to scalp treatments and nourishing maintenance routines. Every service is designed to help your hair flourish, whether you wear it natural or styled.
